alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 4:44AM EDT until April 13 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Dublin affecting Wilkinson, Laurens, Washington and Johnson Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Dublin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Dublin. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and natural flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 80. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 AM EDT Wednesday was 24.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 7.8 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.5 feet on 02/29/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
